title: Trouble in loading screen, repeated crashes.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/d67d648d43077f8a241bd292425da7c8.png

I get this message once the game attempts to launch the loading screen from the champion select. Pressing OK and reconnecting crashes it again and displays the same message, even after repeated attempts. I am currently doing a full client repair using the in client button. Help is appreciated.

Edit: After a full repair, I tried a custom game and the same issue happened, however it would only crash if I pressed OK on the message. If I tried to ignore it, the game would launch (into the custom game with just me) and I could play normal. If I Alt+Tab'ed out of the window and pressed 'ok' on the message that is still there, it crashes the game and I can't reconnect because it will just repeatedly crash.

replies.body: This error can be a result of configuration modifications or 3rd party programs that interact with league.  If that's the case for you, remove any apps like play.tv and others first.  This section on [removing unwanted programs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)can help!  Hope it does the trick!

I only have Overwolf, although it wasn't running during any of this. I'll try to uninstall anything that might mess with it, thanks for responding.

Edit: Is reinstalling any of the programs an issue?
